abstract: Mitt Romney praised Chris Christie after the governor of New Jersey announced Tuesday that he would not join the presidential race.
snippet: Mitt Romney praised Chris Christie after the governor of New Jersey announced Tuesday that he would not join the presidential race.
lead_paragraph: THE VILLAGES, Fla. - Though Mitt Romney has always maintained a casual cool on the topic of a possible Chris Christie candidacy - "It'd be fun if he got in," Mr. Romney said last week in New Hampshire, with a grin plastered on his face that seemed to say it wouldn't necessarily be that much fun at all - he seemed newly emboldened on the topic Wednesday afternoon.

headline.main: As Christie Passes, Romney Campaigns On
